author: trawick
msg: Essentially: The sendfile test is now simple to automate, and runs
automatically from the autoconf-based build's "make check".
Hard-code the same address family on the server side as it already
is on the client side; otherwise, connect will fail on dual-stack
(The socket setup could stand to be rewritten!)
Allow sendfile-as-client to start up the server program
report an error if the client couldn't read stdout from the server within a couple of seconds
client mode: wait a bit for the server to start up if
it was spawned by the client (to solve buildbot failure,
when running in automated mode (client starts the server process),
make the client stop calling apr_connect() as soon as it works or
run the sendfile test automatically (autoconf-based build)
Fix executable file extension on Windows (autoconf-based build)

author: markt
msg: Add support to the Default Servlet for serving gzipped versions of static resources directly from disk as an alternative to Tomcat compressing them on each request. Patch by Philippe Marschall.
